title: Studio - Business Centers, Library and Conference Room! Tour Today!
neighborhood: 505 N. Figueroa St., Los Angeles, CA
posting_body: ['Imagine a home where the fine art of living has been perfected.', 'Welcome to The Orsini, home to the best apartments in downtown Los Angeles.', 'From the moment you enter the elegant Mediterranean inspired 2-story foyer at The Orsini, you will realize that you have come home to a new experience in luxury apartment living.', 'We are in the heart of Los Angeles, California and the pulse of extraordinary living.', 'Enjoy a short commute to the LA Fashion District, Staples Center, Disney Concert Hall, Chinatown and all the amazing dining and glamorous shopping that living in Los Angeles has to offer.', 'AMENITIES AND FEATURES', '-Two Print & Copy Rooms', '-Free Wi-Fi in Common Areas', '-Stainless Steel or Whirlpool Black Appliances', '-Two Pilates Stations', '-Dedicated Gated Parking For Residents', '-Beautiful Los Angeles City Views from Many Vantage Points', '-EV Chargers', '-Self-Cleaning Oven with Gas Range', '-ATM Machines', '-Two Executive Business Centers', '-Karaoke Lounge', '-Fitness Center', 'Call:', 'show contact info', 'WEBSITE', '<URL>', 'ADDRESS', '505 N. Figueroa St., Los Angeles, CA 90012', 'Pricing and availability are subject to change.', 'Student Apartments,  Hancock Park,  DTLA Apartments,  Downtown Los Angeles,  Downtown Los Angeles Housing,  Los Angeles,  DT Los Angeles Housing,  FIDM,  FIDM Housing,  Fashion District,  Mid-City,  Fashion Institute,  Fashion Institute Housing,  Elysian Park,  USC Housing,  Carthay,  Central Los Angeles,  Hollywood Hills West,  University of Southern California Housing,  Pico-Union,  Student Housing,  Hollywood,  Koreatown,  USC Apartments,  Elysian Valley,  Central LA Housing,  Industrial District,  DT Los Angeles Apartments,  East Hollywood,  Downtown LA Housing,  South Park,  USC,  DTLA,  Downtown Apartments,  Gallery Row,  Bunker Hill,  Luxury Housing,  Hollywood Hills,  Downtown LA Apartments,  Historic Core,  Larchmont,  Los Angeles Housing,  University of Southern California,  Central LA,  Financial District,  Harvard Heights,  Little Tokyo,  DTLA Housing,  Arlington Heights,  Toy District,  Central LA Apartments,  Chinatown,  Los Feliz,  Luxury Apartments,  Central Los Angeles Apartments,  Civic Center,  Echo Park,  Windsor Square,  Old Bank District,  Downtown Los Angeles Apartments,  Arts District,  Wholesale District,  Warehouse District,  Los Angeles Apartments,  Westlake,  University of Southern California Apartments,  Central Los Angeles Housing,  Fashion Institute Apartments,  FIDM Apartments,  Downtown Housing,  DT Los Angeles,  Silver Lake,  Downtown LA,  Jewelry District, Downtown,  Griffith Park']
